amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase impact aid funding for school construction by $18 million and reduce National Labor Relations Board salaries and expenses funding accordingly.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 40 in the Congressional Record of September 4, 1997, to increase funds appropriated in the bill for Impact Aid for school construction by $18 million and reducing funds for salaries and expenses within the National Labor Relations Board commensurately.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hayworth amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 170 - 253 (Roll no. 385).
